item.title: Arctix womens Essential Insulated Bib Overalls
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Season after season, the 1450 Arctix Women’s Insulated Bib Overalls serve as an outstanding value priced snow bib and a versatile cornerstone of the Arctix line. These pants feature a 100% Polyester Dobby shell with ThermaLock W/R + W/P 3000mm Coating, offering a maximum degree of durability and protection from ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.41
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:11:25 UTC – Details)


Season after season, the 1450 Arctix Women’s Insulated Bib Overalls serve as an outstanding value priced snow bib and a versatile cornerstone of the Arctix line. These pants feature a 100% Polyester Dobby shell with ThermaLock W/R + W/P 3000mm Coating, offering a maximum degree of durability and protection from the elements, while allowing a full range of motion. 85 grams ThermaTech Insulation offers warmth in a lightweight, low bulk garment, keeping you warm at temperatures from -20° to +35° depending on your level of activity. DWR finish (Durable Water Repellent) helps repel water from fabric surface. The adjustable comfort suspenders provide the perfect fit with elasticized side gussets for maximum motion. The boot zippers make them easy for on and off access along with boot gaiters with grippers to form a seamless integration with the boots to keep the warmth in, and the moisture out. These relaxed fit pants also include 600 Denier Ballistic reinforced ankle, scuff and hem guards to hold up against daily wear & tear, and conveniently has an O-ring for keys, gloves and/or lift tickets. The pants provide zippered hand warmer style pockets, zippered fly, and belt loops. They are water and wind resistant, and are conveniently machine washable. Sizing options include a Short 29″ inseam (5’1″ – 5’4″ heights), Regular 31″ inseam (5’5″ – 5’8″), and Tall 33″ inseam (5’9″ – 6’1″).
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.4 x 12 x 4.5 inches; 1 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1450
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 1, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Arctix
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B072M6V2T2

Imported
Zipper closure
Machine Wash
85 grams ThermaTech Insulation offers warmth in a lightweight, low bulk garment (keeps you warm at temperatures from -20° to Plus-35°)
Adjustable comfort suspenders for the perfect fit with elasticized side gussets for maximum motion
600 Denier Ballistic are used to reinforce the ankle, scuff and hem guards to hold up against daily wear and tear

Read more

ARCTIX bib overalls makes winter more fun.

Windproof and waterproof.

ARCTIX bib overalls are made from high-tech ThermaLock nylon with a wind and waterproof rating of 3,000 mm. Combined with 85 grams of ThermaTech insulation, these overalls will keep you warm and comfortable all day long.

Strong and lightweight.

ThermaTech insulation is a high tech fabric that makes these pants surprisingly soft, lightweight, strong, and durable.

Reinforced scuff guards prevent wear and tear.

ARCTIX bib overalls feature 600 Denier ballistic nylon reinforced ankles and hem guards so they last longer.

  • Zippered fly and ankles makes them easy to put on and take off.
  • Boot gaiters keep warmth in and moisture out.
  • Adjustable comfort-fit waist.
  • Zippered hand warmer pockets.
  • Ideal for hours and hours of winter fun.

Read more




Arctix Women’s Convertible Trail Pant
Arctix Women’s Insulated Snow Pants
Arctix Women’s Snow Sports Insulated Cargo Pants
Arctix Women’s Sarah Fleece-Lined Softshell Pants
Arctix Women’s Lumi Pull Over Fleece Lined Cargo Snow Pants
Choose from other Arctix styles of outerwear Converts to shorts with zip-closure security pocket. Durable coating that offers a higher resistant to outdoor elements including Wind, Water and Snow. Reinforce ankle, scuff and hem guards to hold up against daily wear and tear. Tightly woven face offers abrasion-resistant and Wind-Resistant protection. ThermaLock wind-resistant and waterproof coating offers a maximum degree of durability and protection.
Special Features Moisture Wicking technology that pulls moisture away from the body to keep you cool and ThermaLock treatment for quick dry. Ballistic reinforced ankle, scuff and hem guards holds up against the daily wear and tear. Thermatech insulation offers warmth in a lightweight, low bulk garment (keeps you warm at temperatures from 20° to +35°). Durable water-resistant protection; soft, Brushed inner face for warmth retention. Zippered hand warmer style pockets; Duel Cargo pockets for storage.

A brand you can trust

ARCTIX is a manufacturer of protective winter wear for all ages. We manufacture superior, quality-tested winter clothing that offers maximum protection against the coldest winter days. Each garment is designed and engineered to offer the most comfortable fit and accurate sizing. For any outdoor winter activity in extreme cold and wind, ARCTIX will keep you warmer, drier, and happier longer.

Read more

DESIGNED FOR ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $43.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:53:27 UTC – Details)

From the brand

ABOUT US

romision is dedicated to bring you a touch of warmth in cold winter. It is designed for your comfort and warmth, ease of mobility without any bound feeling. We adapt Newest 24-Hour Constant Temperature Technology into material to give your skin ultrasoft feeling.

DESIGNED FOR SPORTS

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3.94 x 3.94 x 0.79 inches; 14.89 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 14, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08HV6RCQH

Pull On closure
Machine Wash
【All Day Warm & Comfortable】 Our heated thermals for men is made of 92% Polyester and 8% Spandex fabric with Microfiber fleece lined, providing enhanced warmth and insulation. Thus it minimizes heat loss and regulate your body temperature in the cold winter. The tightly closed knitted seams, super Skin-touch and Ultra Soft mens long johns fit snug like a second skin for keeping the cold air out and preserving heat effectively. Keep you Warm and Comfy All Day!
【Superior Moisture Wicking】 Made of Breathable and Quick-drying fiber perfect to absorb sweat and dry fast in exercise. romision long underwear mens is 60% Higher absorbent than other mens thermals. With moisture transport system and odor control function men thermal underwear set, keep you dry and light, easily absorb the unpleasant smell during workout and keep away from the clammy feeling. You can relax or brave the outdoors pursuing your active lifestyle at any time.
【Excellent Flexibility for Any Movement】 The mens long johns thermal set is designed with 4-way stretch compression, its strong seams won’t tearing while keeping elasticity. Mens long underwear add range of motion and offer maximum support for body, you’ll feel a sense of freedom in all activities. Besides, designed to increase the amount of oxygen in the blood, our mens base layer can improve blood circulation, protect you from muscle injury and great for outdoor activities.
【Suit For Any Occasions】 Heated base layer men cold weather with classic round neck design, can be worn inside or outside. You can even use it like pajamas stay at home or sports suit go for a walk outside if you wish and no one knows you have worn thermal underwear men it’s so hip. It is the best mens thermals top and bottom set in cold weather to keep you warm and comfy during skiing, running, jogging, hiking, hunting, walking the dog.
【Warm Gift for Him】 Every man would like to receive such a comfortable and warm men long johns thermal set in cold weather. This thermal for men comes with fleece lining and lightweight provided excellent keep warm performance and windproof function. Wear within a few seconds, you will feel your body heat being trapped inside of the top and bottom. With romision winter underwear thermal men, giving your Lover/Son/Father lasting and warm love during the cold morning.

Heated Thermal Underwear for Men, Fleece Base Layer Men Winter Gear Compression

As the weather gets colder, you want to make you're protected from the cold with mens thermal long johns. They will keep you warm and dry with their moisture-wicking properties, and the snug fit will retain body heat. It will offer full mobility throughout the day.

Compared to other materials, this long underwear for men with excellent Moisture Wicking and Quick Dry performance, instantaneous absorption of sweat after exercise prevents the skin stickiness to protect your musle.

Thanksgiving Gifts for Father, Husband, Boyfriend, Son


I think your father, lover, son, and friends all need such a 24-hour constant temperature mens thermal sets. Don’t forget to buy one for yourself! When they receive this heart-warming gift, I think they will laugh happily and can't wait to try it on.

Details of romision Thermal Underwear Set

  1. Offer Full Flexibility and Body Movement

    4 Way Stretch High Elasticity

    The mens base layer set is designed with four way stretch fabric, which have high elasticity, increasing the range of motion and provide your body with the greatest degree of freedom and support.


  2. 24 Hours Keep You Warm In Cold Weather

    Fleece Lined

    • Mens thermal underwear set is made of 92% Ultra-Soft Polyester + 8% Spandex blend fabric with Microfiber fleece lined, the insulation material which can lock your body heat well.
    • The super skin-touch and ultra soft long johns for men fit snug like a second skin for minimizing heat loss and keep you warm in the cold winter.


  3. Exquisite Stictching

    Clever Seams & Durable

    Neat and flat sutures, clear and meticulous routing. The well-made four-pin six-wire process, avoids friction between the clothing and the skin. At the same time prevents static electricity.


  4. 2 Way Air Circulation Design Prevent Body Odor

    Sweat Wicking & Quick Dry

    Excellent Moisture Wicking and Quick Dry performance, instantaneous absorption of sweat after exercise prevents the skin stickiness to protect your musle.


  5. Casual and Sport Wear

    Crew Neck & Not Exposed

    Classic round neck design, can be worn inside and outside, more personal and warm, suitable for any combination.


  6. Provide a Full Range of Freedom

    Excellent Elasticity

    Elastic Band at the waist to keep the pants from Being Loose, Suitable for men of All Shapes

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);

var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,

currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,

Outdoor Faucet Covers for Winter, 2 PCS 6″Wx 9″H Reusable Outside Faucet Insulated Cover Socks, Freeze Protection Garden Hose Cover Socks for Wall Taps Outside
【High Compatibility】 Faucet cover measures 9in x 6in, 2.3 inch thick. It is about 1-2 inch larger and 1inch thicker than most of other faucet socks. Works well with various faucet types, such as garden spigots, hose bibs, water tap, keep faucets protected in freezing weather.
【Quick & Easy Installtion 】 The faucet socks with Velcro straps are easy to put on and take off even you wear gloves in cold winter. Simply pull the cover over the faucet/tap and fasten it tightly with the Velcro strap. A few seconds is all it takes!
【Superior Protection】 Very thick faucet cover design. In winter protecting your outside faucets from freezing and bursting. In summer prevent faucets from the blazing sun or the rust. Help save costly repairs. It has the functions of antifreeze, rainproof, snowproof, sun exposure, windproof and dust prevention.
【Super Waterproof & Insulation】The water faucet cover for winter is constructed of 3 layers – 210D oxford cloth waterproof coating thicker insulated silk cotton 190t taffeta waterproof coating, making it durable and reusable season after season. effectively keep the faucet dry and warm during.
【Please Confirm Again】You will receive 2 pack faucet protective covers. Please measure the size before purchase,If you don’t know the size of your faucet, you can try to buy. It works well with various faucet types. If you have any questions, please contact us in time. We will reply within 24 hours.

Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:23:38 UTC – Details)


This 2-Piece Klein Tools Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Crimper tool kit is perfect for crimping, wire stripping and cutting. The full-cycle Ratcheting Crimper crimps 10-22 AWG insulated wire terminals. The Self-Adjusting Wire Stripper / Cutter features a self-adjusting stripping head for quick, precise wire stripping. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn’t just the name of our company, it’s also our family name. And since we’re an American company that’s family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.
Wire Stripper and Crimper 2-Piece Tool Kit includes everything a tradesman needs for insulated terminal crimping, wire stripping and cutting
Ratcheting Crimper (Cat No. 3005CR) crimps only insulated terminals onto 10-22 AWG stranded copper wire
Adjustable compound action design puts more crimping power into each squeeze
Three crimping cavities in one tool: 22–16 AWG (Red), 16–14 AWG (Blue) and 12–10 AWG (Yellow) insulated terminals
Wire Stripper and Cutter (Cat. No. 11061) with stripping head that adjusts to strip: 10-20 AWG solid, 12-22 AWG stranded, and 12/2 and 14/2 Romex cable (all sizes) and other nonmetallic (type NM) sheathed cable self adjusts
Adjustable stopper to control the length of the core strip
Tensioning thumb wheel allows for precise stripping of smaller gauge wire

Read more

About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Wiring Tool Kit with Automatic Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Crimper, Great Electrical Tool Kit, 2-Piece

This 2-Piece Klein Tools Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Crimper tool kit is perfect for crimping, wire stripping and cutting. The full-cycle Ratcheting Crimper crimps 10-22 AWG insulated wire terminals. The Self-Adjusting Wire Stripper / Cutter features a self-adjusting stripping head for quick, precise wire stripping.

  • Wire Stripper and Crimper 2-Piece Tool Kit includes everything a tradesman needs for insulated terminal crimping, wire stripping and cutting
  • Ratcheting Crimper (Cat No. 3005CR) crimps only insulated terminals onto 10-22 AWG stranded copper wire
  • Adjustable compound action design puts more crimping power into each squeeze
  • Three crimping cavities in one tool: 22–16 AWG (Red), 16–14 AWG (Blue) and 12–10 AWG (Yellow) insulated terminals
  • Wire Stripper and Cutter (Cat. No. 11061) with stripping head that adjusts to strip: 10-20 AWG solid, 12-22 AWG stranded & 12/2 & 14/2 Romex cable (all sizes) & others (type NM) sheathed cable adjusts
  • Adjustable stopper to control the length of the core strip
  • Tensioning thumb wheel allows for precise stripping of smaller gauge wire
  • Convenient wire cutter in handle

Read more

FEATURES

Wire Stripper and Cutter is perfect for HVAC applications

Provides consistent crimping of insulated 10-22 AWG terminals

Wiring Tool Kit consist of a Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Crimperpixlr

In order to produce perfect outdoor products, HISEA strives to make every detail of each product take into account your needs. Women’s Waterproof Rain Boots Men’s Waterproof Rain Boots What problem are we solving? ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $54.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:11:02 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About HISEA:

HISEA is a company specializing in the production of outdoor wear. In order to produce perfect outdoor products, HISEA strives to make every detail of each product take into account your needs.

Women’s Waterproof Rain Boots

Men’s Waterproof Rain Boots

What problem are we solving?

We are a global brand. Our mission and purpose that guides us in everything we do is to resolve the problem of people’s necessities for work and life, defense against outdoor elements, inspire the dream of a better life for you.

What makes our products unique?

Our products are versatile and functional, easy to take care of. All kinds of products are ranged from men, women to children.

HISEA pre sales & after sales servie?

We love our customers; we provide 24h free contact service and a lifetime quality response of our products.

HISEA Rubber Rain Boots

100% WaterproofInsulatedFlexible

Women’s EVA Hunting boots

Men’s Rubber Rain Boots

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.94 x 12.71 x 4.8 inches; 2.8 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ OneStone
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08B5S8RSS

HISEA women’s garden boots give outdoors lovers all the lightweight performance and 100% waterproof protection. They are designed to be one of the most VERSATILE STYLES, an ideal for where there is mud, slush or rain.
These women’s gardening boots provide 100% Waterproof. 5mm four-way stretch nylon flex-foam boots and high-grade rubber overlays keep feet dry and warm, and providing comfort and support for long time standing.
Lightweight, breathable 2mm H-Airmesh lining allows the air to travel throughout the boots, which keeps your feet much dryer than normal boots. The air mesh is what keeps high-end running shoes cool and dry under intense use. Comfort rated from subfreezing temperatures to 86 °F/30 °C. Best for year-round use.
Roll them down to let inner delicate floral printing outside, they become shoes immediately! These superior boots offer all day comfort wherever you go, they are features an aggressive non-slip sole, shedding debris easily. A removable molded EVA sock liner and reinforced rubber shell provide additional protection to achilles, heel and toe.
PLEASE MIND THE SIZE CHART AND CHOOSE THE RIGHT SIZE BEFORE BUYING! We love our buyers; Boots come with a FREE gift. One Year Quality Assurance Backed By HISEA!

Read more

Breathable air-mesh lining allows air to travel throughout the boots.

Durable rubber layers for additional protection to heel and toe.

Roll them down to let inner delicate floral outside.

5 mm neoprene upper keeps you warm & comfortable.

100% waterproof, lightweight and flexible.

Non-slip durable molded rubber outsoles.

Sealed rubber shell extends up above ankle.

Year-round use; Best for muck mud working, gardening, fishing, hiking, riding and farming.

The original Polar Bottle, reinvented to be your go-to sports bottle that is cool to the core. The newly re-engineered Tri-Layer insulation takes Polar Bottle’s recognized radiant heat reflective technology to the next level, keeping your liquids cooler, two times longer. Whether you’re going to the gym, hitting the studio, headed out on a hike, or commuting to work, Polar Bottle fuels your go. Convenient to use, the Dash Handle makes this sport bottle easy to transport, comfortable to carry, and quick to access. Built for performance and designed for effortless use, the Polar Bottle Insulated Sports bottle is both durable and reliable. Trusted by users for over 25 years. Just like the original, every new Polar Bottle is 100% BPA free, dishwasher safe, made in Colorado USA, and comes with a Lifetime Warranty.
TRI-LAYER INSULATED WATER BOTTLE – Polar Bottle is the original, 100% BPA-free sport insulated water bottle. The updated Sport Insulated Water Bottle features triple wall insulation, keeping your liquid cooler 2X longer than older models.
SPORT CAP WITH HANDLE – Pull for a quick stream of water and push to lock for leakproof transport. The Dash Handle provides quick access during activity. Easy to transport and comfortable to carry.
VERSATILE FOR ANY ACTIVITY – Your go-to sports bottle for team sports, the gym, the studio, or on the trail. Optimized to fit in your bike cage, backpack pocket, or cup holder. Effortless to hold and squeeze
EASY TO CLEAN – The innovative Polar Bottle Sport Cap is two pieces, cap and valve, simply twist and pull for complete access cleaning. Dishwasher safe. When we say easy, we mean it.
MADE IN THE USA – Polar Bottle Insulated Water Bottles are mindfully Crafted in Colorado to reduce environmental impact and support local economies. Designed to last, each one of our water bottles comes with a Lifetime Guarantee.

Read more

The Sport Insulated Polar Bottle helps athletes like you stay refreshed and replenished, no matter your sport of choice. Built for performance and optimized for effortless use, the bottle’s revamped design includes Tri-Layer insulation that keeps liquids cool twice as long, un ultra-thin exterior for squeezable hydration and an integrated Dash Handle for easy transport.

Tri-Layer Insulation

Our recognized radiant heat reflective technology keeps you refreshed and restored in any and all temperatures.

Dash Handle

Provides quick access during activity, easy to transport, and comfortable to carry.

Leak-proof

Sport Cap design leak-proof transport, giving you the freedom to go.

Easy to Clean

Innovative Sport Cap is two pieces – cap + valve – simply twist and pull for complete access cleaning. Dishwasher safe.

Read more

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $71.65 - $45.87
(as of Nov 29,2022 02:17:57 UTC – Details)


Klein Tools’ Interchangeable Insulated Screwdriver Set includes an insulated handle and 5 interchangeable insulated blades for quick changes on the job. The auto-eject mechanism works with just a twist, allowing you to change or flip blades simply and easily. A bright orange coating of insulation protects from electrical shock, as well as being flame and impact resistant. Klein insulated tools exceed the ASTM F1505 standards for insulated tools, and are clearly marked with the official 1000-volt rating symbol. The set of five Phillips, Square and Slotted slim-tip blades come in a protective roll pouch, making this the perfect set for your tool bag.
Interchangeable Insulated Screwdriver Set with an insulated handle, 5 interchangeable insulated blades, and a carrying pouch
Screwdriver Set includes tip sizes: two #2 Phillips, two 1/4-Inch Slotted, one #1 Phillips, one #1 Square, one #2 Square, and one 3/16-Inch Slotted
Securely and easily release the blade with a quick twist of the lock collar
Interchangeable blades with a slim-tip to fit tight terminal blocks
Handle and blade have a 1000-Volt insulation rating and meets or exceeds ASTM F1505 standard for insulation
A layer of orange impact and flame resistant insulation protects from electric shock
Cushion-Grip handles for greater torque and comfort

Read more

About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Insulated Screwdriver, 8-in-1 Screwdriver Set with Interchangeable Blades, 3 Phillips, 3 Slotted and 2 Square Tips

Klein Tools’ Interchangeable Insulated Screwdriver Set includes an insulated handle and 5 interchangeable insulated blades for quick changes on the job. The auto-eject mechanism works with just a twist, allowing you to change or flip blades simply and easily. A bright orange coating of insulation protects from electrical shock, as well as being flame and impact resistant.

  • Interchangeable Insulated Screwdriver Set with an insulated handle, 5 interchangeable insulated blades, and a carrying pouch
  • Includes tip sizes: two #2 Phillips, two 1/4-Inch Slotted, one #1 Phillips, one #1 Square, one #2 Square, and one 3/16-Inch Slotted
  • Securely and easily release the blade with a quick twist of the lock collar
  • Interchangeable blades with a slim-tip to fit tight terminal blocks
  • Handle and blade have a 1000-Volt insulation rating and meets or exceeds F1505 standard for insulation
  • A layer of orange impact and flame resistant insulation protects from electric shock
  • Cushion-Grip handles for greater torque and comfort
  • Double-ended blades have a 3.5-Inch shaft length, single-ended blades have 5.75-Inch shaft length

Read more

FEATURES

Change or flip blade easily with just a twist of the lock collar

Screwdriver has 1000-Volt insulation rating for handle and blade

Screwdriver Set with durable roll pouch for protective storage

Read more
